x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: In many communities in Nigeria, public student transportation is often informal and lacks proper tracking. Parents rely on verbal updates or assumptions about their children’s safe arrival at school and back home.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

ServiceNow App Engine / ServiceNow Studio

Build custom data models for Routes and Student and also incident drivers should be able to log incidents

Service Portal / ESC (Employee Center)

Parent and driver interface for route updates
Students registration and notifications
School admin view for monitoring and managing transportation activities

Flow Designer

Automates notifications for check-ins and incident escalations
Handles approval workflows for route registration and driver verification

Performance Analytics

Track transportation KPIs such as on-time arrival rates, incident frequency, route reliability
Provide safety and compliance reports to stakeholders

Mobile App

Allows drivers to check in/out on the go
Provides parents with real-time notifications
Supports incident reporting and GPS location capture

AI Search / Recommendation

Suggest optimal routes or alert patterns based on past trip data.

 

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Integration with SMS Gateway (bulk SMS provider) and WhatsApp API to support low-cost notification delivery to parents who may not have smartphones
  • GPS Tracking Integration to monitor live routes and detect deviations
  • Identity Verification System for authenticating drivers and ensuring child safety
  • School Information System Integration to sync student records

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Driver and Vehicle Vetting: Ensuring only trusted and verified drivers are onboarded
  • Connectivity Gaps: Reaching parents who rely on basic phones or areas with poor internet
  • Change Management: Encouraging schools, drivers, and parents to adopt the platform consistently
  • Data Privacy & Security: Handling sensitive student location data securely
  • Integration Complexity: Coordinating with external SMS and GPS systems
